document_data.mainbody:
The House of the Binder was a large temple of Oghma located in the fortress-keep of Candlekeep by the midâ€“14 century DR and still standing in the late 15 century DR.
The temple could be found on the western side of the Court of Air, within the keeps outer wall. It was spacious enough to allow for a number of his followers to set up camp and socialize within.
